p: Ultralow volume (ULV) aerosols of concentrated insecticide (generally >50% active ingredient) are usually referred to as ULV; the quantity of liquid dispensed can be as little as 50Â mL/ha. Indoor space sprays with low volume and ULV aerosols are more effective when applied as indoor space sprays, because adult A. aegypti are highly endophilic ( Lofgren, 1972).
